synopsis.text:
City of Sorasaki appears to be an ordinary place, but beneath its tranquil facade, a secret war is waging against a global crime syndicate, Mouryo. High school student Momo Minamoto, who appears to be a reserved and unassuming girl, is actually a new recruit of the private intelligence agency Tsukikage. With her heightened senses and unique ability to gain strength from spices, Momo is tasked with protecting her city and its people from the shadows.

Under the guidance of her senior, Yuki Hanzoumon, and alongside her fellow Tsukikage members, Momo embarks on dangerous missions to maintain law and order. Balancing her high school life with her secret identity, Momo must master her skills and learn to trust her teammates in order to keep her loved ones safe. As she grows stronger and more confident, Momo and her friends work together to uncover the mysteries surrounding Mouryo and bring them to justice.

Join Momo and the Tsukikage in "Release the Spyce," an action-packed spy series that explores the thrilling world of undercover agents and the power of friendship. With each mission, they fight to protect the city they love and preserve the peace that Sorasaki's residents hold dear.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
